meanings.definition: A specialized hyphal tip or structure used by certain fungi to attach to and penetrate the host plant.
meanings.sent1: The appressoria of the fungus firmly grip the plant for support.
meanings.sent2: The appressoria help the fungus to cling onto the plant tightly.
meanings.sent3: The appressoria decided to have a race to see which one could attach to the plant first.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny hooks, the appressoria latch onto the plant with precision.
meanings.sent5: The appressoria act like tiny hands, grabbing onto the plant with determination.
